Home / P

▌ the objective: find a/some stable pattern(s) within => 2025-10-03-this-session-is-being-continued-from-a-previous-co.txt => - find a repeatable and reliable method to extract the data we need. - currently there are promising but uncertain methods: - lines that begin with a verb or action - these symbols [ “⏺”, “>”, “⎿” ]

patterns to NOT touch: - any lines that are indented more than 4 spaces - as a fallback: - any line beginning with a number
